title: Albertrech Fanart
body:
Hey everybody, I finished a new piece of league fanart recently and I thought this would be a good place to share it.

The Syndra pic is my newest one and was heavily inspired by the Ahri fanart that was done by Kienan Lafferty recently. The Riven and Vi images are a bit older hence them kinda just standing there (and Vi's waist being abnormally thin).

If you like my art and want to see more of it, I upload all my my stuff on my tumblr [here.](http://albertrechart.tumblr.com/)

Thanks for looking :)

replies.body: they are all pretty good, but im gonna say one thing - is that vi like super anorexic? xD nah but gj on these :P

Thanks,

The problem with Vi is that It's the oldest of the 3 pics, my grasp on anatomy was pretty non existent at that point.
I like them, but syndras arms look a _little_ out of proportion.
